member.name: ID2D1GdiInteropRenderTarget.GetDC
member.summary: Retrieves the device context associated with this render target.
member.param: A value that specifies whether the device context should be cleared.
When this method returns, contains the device context associated with this render target. You must allocate storage for this parameter.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1GdiInteropRenderTarget.ReleaseDC
member.summary: Indicates that drawing with the device context retrieved using the method is finished.
member.param: The modified region of the device context, or NULL to specify the entire render target.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1GdiInteropRenderTarget
member.summary: Provides access to a device context that can accept GDI drawing commands.
